name: To Cloud Nine
description:
A short, simple riddle-puzzle game about a little trip to happiness. Play as a little witch in small sky space where matters only makes sense to her. Solve riddles to get where she wants to be. "There isn't any place like home".

CONTROLS:

  • W/A/S/D control
  • Double jump enabled
  • Mouse for puzzles

Second game for my internship program at Mojiken Studio. Any comments or feedback appreciated!

_____

If the browser takes too long too load, please consider downloading the executable files!
